title: Wholesales Manager
description:
Acquire and manage merchants: 60%
•	Maintain relationship with available merchants to push sales
•	Set plan to acquire new merchants
•	Maximizing customer service to satisfy customer’s problem
Wholesales Business Development: 30%
•	Coordinates business development and project management initiatives
•	Effectively develops sales, marketing and revenue plans
•	Drives incremental revenue
•	Develops & executes a coherent business strategy
•	Recommends short – and long – range business development objectives
•	Successfully assesses trends, problems, and revenue opportunities
•	Skillfully articulates the value of our products & service to customers
•	Responds to question in real time
•	Aggressively implements marketing strategies
•	Forecasts & develops annual sales quotas
•	Consistently projects expected sales volume & profitability
•	Develops strategies and tactics for new business generation
Leadership: 10%	
•	Lead, coach and train for employees
•	Make sure the team work effectively and have good performance
requirements:
•	It is very essential to have good leadership skills to be a wholesale manager.
•	They should have completed knowledge about the products stocked by the wholesaler.
•	The managers who deal with the client should have good negotiating skill.
•	It is also important to have training skills, in case training is required to be given.
•	The wholesale manager should have good motivation skills.
•	Wholesale experience 
•	Excellent communication skills 
•	Must have a Fashion/Luxury Goods retail background 
•	Ability to communicate in local languages & English
•	Education and Qualifications:
•	In order to be a wholesale manager, an individual must possess a management degree. Any specialized course or degree in management will also prove to be beneficial.
